entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as speaking brightly in the text. She says 'Daddy will be pleased'.

entities.name: rita
entities.description: Rita is mentioned as having a muscle twitch in her jaw and balancing the Quick-Quotes Quill on parchment.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as watching Rita balance the Quick-Quotes Quill and being asked by Hermione if he's ready to tell the public the truth.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as asking Harry if he's ready to tell the public the truth and fishing a cherry out of her glass.

relationships.description: Rita is holding the Quick-Quotes Quill, as mentioned in the text.
Hermione has a cherry, which she fished out of her glass.
